ettn2026.title: E-TTN 2026: What Business Needs to Know Now
ettn2026.excerpt: From January 1, 2026, electronic waybills become mandatory. Here's how to prepare for the changes.
ettn2026.content:
## What is E-TTN?

Electronic Transport Document (E-TTN) is a digital document that replaces paper waybills. From January 1, 2026, it becomes mandatory for all participants in the logistics chain in Ukraine.

## Why It Matters?

Transitioning to E-TTN is not just digitizing documents. It's a step towards:
- **Transparency**: all operations are recorded in a single system
- **Time savings**: processing takes minutes instead of hours
- **Fewer errors**: automatic form filling and data validation

## How to Prepare?

### 1. System Integration
You need to integrate your accounting system with the state E-TTN registry. Trexim provides ready-made APIs for quick integration.

### 2. Staff Training
Your drivers and logistics staff need to learn to work with the new system. We offer free training materials.

### 3. Testing
Test the system in pilot mode before the end of 2025 to avoid problems after launch.

## Trexim Will Help

Our platform fully supports E-TTN:
- Automatic creation and sending
- Electronic signature
- Integration with 1C and other systems
- Mobile app for drivers

Join the pilot program and be ready for 2026!

aiLogistics.title: How AI is Transforming Ukrainian Logistics
aiLogistics.excerpt: Artificial intelligence automates 70% of routine operations. Learn which processes you can optimize today.
aiLogistics.content:
## Revolution in Logistics

Artificial intelligence is no longer the future ‚Äî it's the present of Ukrainian logistics. Companies that have implemented AI solutions reduce operational costs by 40% and increase order processing speed by 3 times.

## What AI Already Does?

### Document Automation
- **Document recognition**: AI instantly processes waybills, invoices and contracts
- **Data verification**: automatic validation and error detection
- **Classification**: smart categorization of cargo and routes

### Route Optimization
AI analyzes hundreds of factors:
- Real-time traffic
- Weather conditions
- Fuel costs
- Road conditions
- Loading/unloading time

Result: up to 30% savings on fuel and delivery time.

### Demand Forecasting
Machine learning predicts:
- Seasonal fluctuations
- Peak loads
- Transport needs
- Delay risks

## Business Benefits

**Speed**: order processing in seconds instead of hours
**Accuracy**: 99% accuracy in predictions
**Savings**: 40% cost reduction
**Scalability**: handling any volume of orders

## AI in Trexim

Our platform uses advanced AI technologies:
- Smart route planning
- Automatic document processing
- Predictive analytics
- Chatbot for drivers and clients

Try the demo and see for yourself!
